title: abdul bahAi vAzhgavE
sahitya:
abdul bahAi vAzhgavE nI anbAl anaivarukkum inba vazhi vaghuttAi


anupallavi

  siddhAnta vEdAnta shIlarum viyandiDum siranda orumai aram tanaip-pAlittAi


caraNam    mallADum ulagainar mana mayakkam tIrum mAsaTra shuddhAnma nEsattai Ukkinai
allA oruvanE ellAr uLamum avan Alayamenranai jnAlattai venranai
